response_text: Here are top options for Persian (Farsi) audio‑to‑text transcription (from easiest casual use to more powerful/commercial tools):  1) Notta – good all‑around automatic transcription. Upload audio/video and get Farsi text quickly with editing/export tools. Works on web and mobile. Notta [https://www.notta.ai/en/transcribe-persian]  2) Sonix – strong AI transcription service with good accuracy, editor, export options (DOCX/SRT etc.). Works well for recordings and media. Sonix+1 [https://sonix.ai/convert-persian-m4a-files-to-text]  3) Soniox – real‑time and accurate Persian speech recognition with support for mixed languages and speaker detection (API and app). Soniox | Speech-to-Text AI+1 [https://soniox.com/speech-to-text/persian]  4) HappyScribe – online tool that can do both AI and human‑assisted Persian transcripts and format exports. HappyScribe [https://www.happyscribe.com/transcribe-persian]  5) VMEG AI / TranscribeToText / FineVoice – free or freemium online AI converters that handle Persian files quickly (simple upload → text). VMEG AI+2Transcribe to Text+2 [https://www.vmeg.ai/tools/audio-to-text/persian-transcription/]  6) Mobile voice apps (for simple dictation)  VoTyPer / Persian Voice Typing (Android) – basic Farsi speech‑to‑text app. Google Play [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?hl=fa&id=com.PersianVoiceTyping.PersianSpeechToText]  “بگو مینویسه” – Persian speech‑to‑text app on mobile. Google Play [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?hl=fa&id=com.bbgroup.speechtotext]  Developer/Custom options:  Speechmatics API – strong Persian ASR API for apps/services. speechmatics.com [https://www.speechmatics.com/speech-to-text/persian]  Notes:  For best accuracy on noisy or long recordings, Sonix, Soniox, or HappyScribe are strong choices.  For quick online use or free trials, Notta plus the free web converters are easiest.  For mobile live dictation, simple apps like VoTyPer work.  If you need professional human‑verified transcripts, services like GoTranscript offer that (paid). gotranscript.com [https://gotranscript.com/en/blog/top-5-persian-farsi-transcription-services-2026]  Want me to compare cost and accuracy between these?
